Package Utility

Class FormValidation

java.lang.Object
Utility.FormValidation
public class FormValidation extends Object
Form Validation utility class to validate data input by the user

  • Constructor Details

    • FormValidation

      public FormValidation()
      FormValidation Constructor

      Creates two ArrayLists responsible for the possible input errors and the error messages that the user will see if an input error has occurred

  • Method Details

    • nullValueCheckAppt

      public ArrayList<String> nullValueCheckAppt(javafx.scene.control.TextField titleTF, javafx.scene.control.TextField descTF, javafx.scene.control.TextField locationTF, javafx.scene.control.DatePicker startDatePick, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> startTimeCombo, javafx.scene.control.TextField typeTF, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<Integer> custIdCombo, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<Integer> userIdCombo, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> contactCombo, javafx.scene.control.DatePicker endDatePick, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> endTimeCombo)
      NullValueCheckAppt method which checks for null values when an appointment is created or modified
      Parameters:
      titleTF - The title text field from the add or modify appointment screen
      descTF - The description text field from the add or modify appointment screen
      locationTF - The location text field from the add or modify appointment screen
      startDatePick - The start date picker from the add or modify appointment screen
      startTimeCombo - The start time combo box from the add or modify appointment screen
      typeTF - The type text field from the add or modify appointment screen
      custIdCombo - The customer id combo box from the add or modify appointment screen
      userIdCombo - The user id combo box from the add or modify appointment screen
      contactCombo - The contact combo box from the add or modify appointment screen
      endDatePick - The end date picker from the add or modify appointment screen
      endTimeCombo - The end time combo box from the add or modify appointment screen
      Returns:
      A list of errors the user needs to rectify

    • dateTimeChecks

      public ArrayList<String> dateTimeChecks(javafx.scene.control.DatePicker startDatePick, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> startTimeCombo, javafx.scene.control.DatePicker endDatePick, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> endTimeCombo)

      startTimeCombo - The start time combo box from the add or modify appointment screen
      endDatePick - The end date picker from the add or modify appointment screen
      endTimeCombo - The end time combo box from the add or modify appointment screen
      Returns:
      A list of errors the user needs to rectify

    • apptOverlapExists

      public boolean apptOverlapExists(javafx.scene.control.TextField apptIdTF, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<Integer> custIdCombo, javafx.scene.control.DatePicker startDatePick, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> startTimeCombo, javafx.scene.control.DatePicker endDatePick, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> endTimeCombo) throws SQLException
      ApptOverlapExists (Appointment Overlap Exists) method which checks for an appointment overlap based on the customer the user selected
      Parameters:
      apptIdTF - The appointment id text field from the add or modify appointment screen
      custIdCombo - The customer id combo box from the add or modify appointment screen
      startDatePick - The start date picker from the add or modify appointment screen
      startTimeCombo - The start time combo box from the add or modify appointment screen
      endDatePick - The end date picker from the add or modify appointment screen
      endTimeCombo - The end time combo box from the add or modify appointment screen
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating the existence of an appointment overlap
      Throws:
      SQLException - Signals an SQLException has occurred

      nullValueCheckCustomer method which checks for null values when a customer is created or modified
      Parameters:
      nameTF - The name text field from the add or modify customer screen
      phoneTF - The phone number text field from the add or modify customer screen
      addressTF - The address text field from the add or modify customer screen
      postalTF - The postal code text field from the add or modify customer screen
      countryCB - The country combo box from the add or modify customer screen
      divisionCB - The division combo box from the add or modify customer screen
      Returns:
      A list of errors the user needs to rectify
